description:
Factional disputes always a concern with politics, but when it escalates into total chaos, it can spell the downfall of a government. And as the strength of the Ashikaga shogunate was sapped by conflicts within, it would set a stage for century long tumult of the Sengoku period...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nani ga Nandaka, Ounin no Ran!
What the Heck Is Happening?! The Onin War
なにがなんだか, 応仁の乱!
